#nft #nftart #NFTartists #nftcollectors #nftcollection #NFTCommunity #OpenSeaNFT #Astrophotography

This is it guys! The last project for my Canon 70-200 f4. I gathered more data and built on my previous image of Orion complex which was only 45 minutes. I managed to get a total of 96 minutes integration and reveal more colors and fine details around the dust clouds. https://t.co/GinxwmELt5

Really cold weather, snow and Orion is the perfect combination for some winter astro imaging. The strong NE wind pulled the clouds towards the ridge behind the trees but I luckily I had the time to get the shots I wanted to.ğŸ¥¶ğŸŒŒ https://t.co/8sPW5qUsrN

Stay frosty guys! Sometimes literally ğŸ˜‚ğŸ¥¶Photographing in the cold is really exhausting physically and mentally. But you always get the best view ğŸŒŒ

Returning to the winter night sky with Orion as my target. Integrating only for 45mins was enough to reveal the nebulae and the surrounding dust in great detail. https://t.co/CnXHr2Ps3L

I got this panorama during one of the great nights that we experienced in northern Norway. When we arrived the activity was pretty low but the green lady decided to dance for us. From left to right, you can spot Andromeda galaxy, Cygnus region and @NightLights_AM doing his magic! https://t.co/2uTLBHPmYB
